name: Cave Buddies
description:
Cave Buddies is a local 2-player cooperative game about exploring dark caves searching for your friend's missing, gold lantern.

Music composed by "Elorin" https://soundcloud.com/user-918053509

Additional music by "Dr_Monkfish" www.johnnaeder.com

and

Joseph "Kistol" Gilbert https://soundcloud.com/kistol

At least one gamepad required, two recommended.
